nodes.text: The Wonder Column, originally published as The New Wonder Column, was an ongoing feature in a number of early Star Wars Insider magazines written by Anthony Daniels. It began in Star Wars Insider 26 and continued through issue 34; its inclusion in new issues became sporadic from that point on. It returned as The Wonder Column in issue 38, but after appearing on in #40, #41 and #42, it went on a hiatus and was eventually dropped from the Departments listing in issue 47.
Daniels would later pen a special-edition Wonder Column for issue 200 of the magazine.
